<S%H5027>Look<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> and to <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> that <S%H2342>bore<s%> you: for I <S%H7121>called<s%> him <S%H259>alone,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him, and <S%H7235>increased<s%> him.

<S%H7181>Listen<s%> to me, my <S%H5971>people;<s%> and give <S%H238>ear<s%> to me, O my <S%H3816>nation:<s%> for a <S%H8451>law<s%> shall <S%H3318>proceed<s%> from me, and I will make my <S%H4941>judgment<s%> to <S%H7280>rest<s%> for a <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

My <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> is <S%H7138>near;<s%> my <S%H3468>salvation<s%> is <S%H3318>gone<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and my <S%H2220>arms<s%> shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> the <S%H339>isles<s%> shall <S%H6960>wait<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> me, and on my <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall they <S%H3176>trust.<s%>

<S%H5375>Lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H5027>look<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8478>beneath:<s%> for the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H4414>vanish<s%> away like <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall wax <S%H1086>old<s%> like a <S%H899>garment,<s%> and they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H3644>like<s%> <S%H3654>manner:<s%> but my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> shall be for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> and my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> shall not be <S%H2865>abolished.<s%>

<S%H8085>Listen<s%> to me, you that <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> is my <S%H8451>law;<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> you not the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be you <S%H2865>afraid<s%> of their <S%H1421>revilings.<s%>

<S%H5782>Awake,<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H5797>strength,<s%> O <S%H2220>arm<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> as in the <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> in the <S%H1755>generations<s%> of <S%H5769>old.<s%> Are you not it that has <S%H2672>cut<s%> <S%H7294>Rahab,<s%> and <S%H2490>wounded<s%> the <S%H8577>dragon?<s%>

But I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> that <S%H7280>divided<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> whose <S%H1530>waves<s%> <S%H1993>roared:<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

And I have <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and I have <S%H3680>covered<s%> you in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that I may <S%H5193>plant<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and lay the <S%H3245>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> You are my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H5782>Awake,<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> <S%H6965>stand<s%> up, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of his <S%H2534>fury;<s%> you have <S%H8354>drunken<s%> the <S%H6907>dregs<s%> of the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H8653>trembling,<s%> and <S%H4680>wrung<s%> them out.

<S%H2007>These<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> things are <S%H7122>come<s%> to you; <S%H4310>who<s%> shall be <S%H5110>sorry<s%> for you? <S%H7701>desolation,<s%> and <S%H7667>destruction,<s%> and the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> by <S%H4310>whom<s%> shall I <S%H5162>comfort<s%> you?

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> you <S%H6041>afflicted,<s%> and <S%H7937>drunken,<s%> but not with <S%H3196>wine:<s%>
